      • encode

        public HpackEncoder.State encode(MimeHeaders headers,
                                 ByteBuffer target)
        Encodes the headers into a buffer.
        参数:
        headers - The headers to encode
        target - The buffer to which to write the encoded headers
        返回:
        The state of the encoding process
